body: i do not want to pay for emerald anymore but how do I cancel it so Avicus not longer take money out my bank?
body_tagged: i do not want to pay for emerald anymore but how do I cancel it so Avicus not longer take money out my bank?
title: How do I cancel emerald?

replies.body: Did you pay the full $50 or the monthly fee?
replies.body_tagged: Did you pay the full $50 or the monthly fee?

replies.body: If you're paying with a monthly subscription, cancel the subscription via the PayPal website. I would assume it's the same process with Google Wallet. If you paid $50 for it, you cannot get a refund.
replies.body_tagged: If you're paying with a monthly subscription, cancel the subscription via the PayPal website. I would assume it's the same process with Google Wallet. If you paid $50 for it, you cannot get a refund.

replies.body:
If you paid for a subscription per month, just cancel your subscription. I am not quite sure how that process works out, though. However, if you paid the full $50 for your rank, you cannot get a refund. 

Either way, whatever money has been transacted cannot be refunded.
replies.body_tagged:
If you paid for a subscription per month, just cancel your subscription. I am not quite sure how that process works out, though. However, if you paid the full $50 for your rank, you cannot get a refund. 

Either way, whatever money has been transacted cannot be refunded.

replies.body: You can cancel a monthy payment in your PayPal settings.
replies.body_tagged: You can cancel a monthy payment in your PayPal settings.

replies.body: You can cancel the monthly subscription. I don't think you can cancel if you payed for lifetime.
replies.body_tagged: You can cancel the monthly subscription. I don't think you can cancel if you payed for lifetime.

replies.body: Why would you want to cancel something you've payed for for a life time?
replies.body_tagged: Why would you want to cancel something you've payed for for a life time?

reply_to.body: You can cancel the monthly subscription. I don't think you can cancel if you payed for lifetime.
reply_to.body_tagged: You can cancel the monthly subscription. I don't think you can cancel if you payed for lifetime.

replies.body:
If the person realizes that they've "wasted" their money on a game, they'll probably want the money back to buy something that is more useful for themselves.

If you donate to the server, just think that you are helping to keep it up and running. Donations don't just go into Ivy's pocket; the help the server to function.

replies.body:
Where does my money go? 
Any money directed towards The Avicus Network will primarly go towards the costs to maintain and run the servers. In addition to server costs, money may also go towards giveaways as well as developers whom make the server possible. By purchasing anything from Avicus you are helping us keep the servers up and running!

Funky=A developer.
He doesn't do this for free m8; obviously he pays his monthly server renting but if he makes a profit what else can he do with the money? 
Rent more servers that no-one uses?

Funky still tries to grab money when he can; but the server is currently at a decline in growth so who knows whether or not he's currently at a profit or loss...

replies.body:
Server hosting + website + DDoS protection isn't cheap m8. 

This server has also has been gaining players over the last few months. 

He he also does spend a shitload of time helping the server so whether or not he is justified for profiting is up for debate. This is if he does use bye money for his own purposes too.
